channel.title: Protocols for Future, Large-Scale & Diverse Network Transports
channel.description: Recent content on Protocols for Future, Large-Scale & Diverse Network Transports

item.description: PFLDNeT 2010 - Getting There    November 28-29, 2010 Franklin & Marshall College    Lancaster, Pennsylvania -- Important Notes Directions and Parking: Please see the following Google map for getting to F&M, and for detailed relevant local information. We have 15 reserved spots for PFLDNeT attendees, which will be marked as "

PFLDnet 2010- Call for papers    November 28-29, 2010 Franklin & Marshall College    Lancaster, Pennsylvania -- Call for Papers PFLDNeT 2010 The 8th International Workshop on Protocols for Future, Large-Scale and Diverse Network Transports (PFLDNeT) Franklin & Marshall College, Lancaster, Pennsylvania, USA November 28-29, 2010 Web page: http://pfld.

PFLDnet 2010 Committees    November 28-29, 2010 Franklin & Marshall College    Lancaster, Pennsylvania -- COMMITTEES Program Committee Chairs: Bryan Ford, Yale University, USA Injong Rhee, North Carolina State University, USA Steering Committee: Lachlan Andrew, Swinburne University of Technology, Australia Lars Eggert, Nokia Research Center, Finland Richard Hughes-Jones, Univ.

PFLDNeT 2010 - Registration    November 28-29, 2010 Franklin & Marshall College    Lancaster, Pennsylvania -- Registration Registration Steps Step 1: Pay registration fee here. Step 2: Fill out general information and preferences here. Registration Options Regular Registration (Ends November 15, midnight EST): General: USD 200

PFLDnet 2010 - Paper submission instructions    November 28-29, 2010 Franklin & Marshall College    Lancaster, Pennsylvania -- Submission Instructions Paper Format: The papers must be in PDF format, US letter sized, with a maximum length of 6 pages (including all figures and references). Font size should be 10pt or larger and all fonts must be embedded in the PDF file.

window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',function(){var v=archive_analytics.values;v.service='wb';v.server_name='wwwb-app41.us.archive.org';v.server_ms=92;archive_analytics.send_pageview({});}); WB_wombat_Init("https://web.archive.org/web/", "20191028113708", "pfld.net"); __wbhack.init('https://web.archive.org/web'); PFLDnet 2006 The International Workshop on Protocols for Fast Long-Distance Networks at CERN (PFLDnet2003), Argonne (PFLDnet2004), and in Lyon(PFLDnet2005) were very successful in bringing together many researchers from all over the world including North America, Europe and Asia who are working on these problems.
